name: Critter Contagion
description:
In a town populated by rodents, one of them carries a deadly plague. If left alone, this disease will spread to the entire town. The only way to save everyone is to kill the person infected, but you'll need to do some detective work to figure out who's sick, lest you take the life of an innocent. 

Game is an executable and runs on Windows. You can change your resolution by editing the settings file in the data folder.

Use WSAD to move. Left click when close to NPCs to talk to them.
